sys_ux_client_script.name: OpenAssignmentModalTier2

sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="SOW Overview Tier2 SNC">cdb246851b7f155062e50ed2cd4bcbf0</macroponent><name>OpenAssignmentModalTier2</name><preset/><required_translations>[ {
  "code" : "",
  "message" : "Reassign",
  "comment" : ""
} ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
* @param {params} params
* @param {api} params.api
* @param {any} params.event
* @param {any} params.imports
* @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
*/
async function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    var sysId = event.payload.sysId;
    var table = event.payload.table;
    api.emit('MACROPONENT_VIEWPORT_LOAD_REQUESTED', {
        viewportElementId: 'modal_viewport',
        route: 'sowformmodal',
        fields: {
            table: table,
            sysId: sysId,
            title: await helpers.translate("Reassign")
        },
        params: {
            "modalPath": "assign_modal",
            "requiredFields": ["assignment_group", "assigned_to", "work_notes"],
            "isGFormSave": "false",
        }
    });
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Terry.Lillo</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-12-14 13:54:54</sys_created_on><sys_id>e4c24a851b7f155062e50ed2cd4bcb31</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>OpenAssignmentModalTier2</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Invoice Portal" source="d778dcbd1b6ec9d08c5143f3cc4bcbb2">d778dcbd1b6ec9d08c5143f3cc4bcbb2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Invoice Portal">d778dcbd1b6ec9d08c5143f3cc4bcbb2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_e4c24a851b7f155062e50ed2cd4bcb31</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Terry.Lillo</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-12-14 14:21:14</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
